snippet: An arm of the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board said on Thursday that it would be the latest partner in a merchant banking business run by Kohlberg Kravis Roberts.
abstract: An arm of the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board said on Thursday that it would be the latest partner in a merchant banking business run by Kohlberg Kravis Roberts.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Canada Pension Plan Unit to Join K.K.R. Merchant Banking Venture
